subject: Football
Bowling
lead_paragraph: The Jets need a No. 2 receiver to keep defenses from double-teaming Laveranues Coles, and Jerricho Cotchery appears ready to take on that role.
snippet: The Jets need a No. 2 receiver to keep defenses from double-teaming Laveranues Coles, and Jerricho Cotchery appears ready to take on that role.
